section.p: To renounce the worship of Maka, you must pay 15 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation.
A man, lying on a pallet, groans, ‘I renounced the goddess, and look at me now...’ He is ravaged by disease.

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
pay the 15 Shards and delete Maka
from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
